name: Fall (itch) (ZiweiZhang)
description:
You take an adventure in a different world. Here are many strange creatures, such as bubble monsters which can hurt you and holy flowers which helps you to recover. There is no goal in that world. You can explore anywhere as long as you want! Are you tired of the nervous atmosphere in the fighting game, endless missions in role-playing game, or extremely difficulties of some video games? Why don’t slow down and explore that mysterious world, Jumping from a higher place and enjoy the ease of slowly falling down?  Come and play! You are the first brave explorer.

Made by Ziwei Zhang.

Press ← and → to move left and right

Press "X" to jump
